1dfababc-5e4d-4202-899d-7f5456829244.name: install headless Chrome
1dfababc-5e4d-4202-899d-7f5456829244.description:
Install headless Chrome in EC2 RHEL 7.3 using yum
http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/add-repositories.html
https://medium.com/@davidkadlec/installing-google-chrome-on-amazon-linux-ec2-d1cb6aa37f28
https://www.sitepoint.com/headless-chrome-node-js/
1dfababc-5e4d-4202-899d-7f5456829244.script:
mkdir ~/tmp
cd ~/tmp
rm -f installChrome.sh
pwd
ls -l
saveTemplate:/home/<%s.systemUser%>/tmp/installChrome.sh
<%s.waitFor%> /home/<%s.systemUser%>/tmp/installChrome.sh
sudo yum repolist all

chmod 770 ~/tmp/installChrome.sh

./installChrome.sh

tempArr.c:
#!/bin/sh
sudo rm -f /etc/yum.repos.d/google-chrome.repo
sudo touch /etc/yum.repos.d/google-chrome.repo
sudo chmod 666 /etc/yum.repos.d/google-chrome.repo

sudo echo -e "[google-chrome]
name=google-chrome
baseurl=http://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/rpm/stable/\$basearch
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://dl-ssl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub" >> /etc/yum.repos.d/google-chrome.repo

sudo touch /etc/yum.repos.d/centos.repo
sudo chmod 666 /etc/yum.repos.d/centos.repo

sudo echo -e "[CentOS-base]
name=CentOS-6 - Base
mirrorlist=http://mirrorlist.centos.org/?release=6&arch=x86_64&repo=os
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=http://mirror.centos.org/centos/RPM-GPG-KEY-CentOS-6

" >> /etc/yum.repos.d/centos.repo

sudo echo -e "#released updates
[CentOS-updates]
name=CentOS-6 - Updates
mirrorlist=http://mirrorlist.centos.org/?release=6&arch=x86_64&repo=updates
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=http://mirror.centos.org/centos/RPM-GPG-KEY-CentOS-6

" >> /etc/yum.repos.d/centos.repo

sudo echo -e "#additional packages that may be useful
[CentOS-extras]
name=CentOS-6 - Extras
mirrorlist=http://mirrorlist.centos.org/?release=6&arch=x86_64&repo=extras
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=http://mirror.centos.org/centos/RPM-GPG-KEY-CentOS-6
" >> /etc/yum.repos.d/centos.repo

sudo yum install -y google-chrome-stable
sudo chmod 600 /etc/yum.repos.d/google-chrome.repo
sudo chmod 600 /etc/yum.repos.d/centos.repo

sudo yum -y install gnu-free-sans-fonts

google-chrome-stable --version

tempArr.c:
#!/bin/bash
return_=0
# set to 0 if found
ls node_modules | grep $1 >/dev/null 2>&1 && { return_=1; }
ls /usr/lib/node_modules | grep $1 >/dev/null 2>&1 && { return_=1; }
  if [ "$return_" -eq 1 ]; then
    echo Found
  else
    echo Not found
    sudo npm install $1 $2 --save#!/bin/bash
    sleep 3
  fi
echo done

67f12ba1-4f14-41ce-bc0a-178b46791f9d.name: Hello World Data Store
67f12ba1-4f14-41ce-bc0a-178b46791f9d.description: Adds simple file based persistence. Creates new json file only if it does not exist.
67f12ba1-4f14-41ce-bc0a-178b46791f9d.script:
rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert new saveFileName
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%saveFileName%' <%a.projectPath%>/<%c.saveFileName%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert jsonVar
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%jsonVar%' <%c.jsonVar%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

echo -e '\n//<%a.add_inits%>' >> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt 

#insert updated template into currentHtmlInsert
<%s.Replace file line with file%> '<%a.add_inits%>' <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt <%a.serverPathFile%> 

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

echo 'var:dataStoreVar:<%c.jsonVar%>'
echo 'var:dataStoreFile:<%a.projectPath%>/<%c.saveFileName%>'

#Create datastore file if it does not exist
if [ ! -e <%a.projectPath%>/<%c.saveFileName%> ]; then
setPromptCodes:3e 20
   echo '{}' > <%a.projectPath%>/<%c.saveFileName%>;
   echo 'New data store created'
else
   echo 'Existing data store file found'
fi
setPrompt:[SysStack]

b52220d3-8abf-4ae2-8d50-af3818260df9.name: Hello World Data Store Get (/helloworldGet)
b52220d3-8abf-4ae2-8d50-af3818260df9.description:
Provides a simple service to get jason data from a data store.
Returns a row or all rows. 
Call service with 'id=#' to get all rows. Call with 'id=[id]' to get a specific row.
Eg: 
http://myNode/ezGet&id=#
   This will return all rows
http://myNode/ezGet&id=123
  This will return only row where id=123
b52220d3-8abf-4ae2-8d50-af3818260df9.script:
rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert jsonVar
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%jsonVar%' <%p.dataStoreVar%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert service End Point name
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serviceEndPointName%' <%c.serviceEndPointName%>  <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
echo var:ezDataGetServiceEndPointName:<%c.serviceEndPointName%>

#add currentHtmlInsert point to end of template

#insert updated template into server file
<%s.Replace file line with file%> '<%a.insertServices%>' <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt <%a.serverPathFile%> 

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

c3b64133-4783-423f-92f8-d0eff748a1a5.name: re/start node
c3b64133-4783-423f-92f8-d0eff748a1a5.description:
Calls sudo forever start to start the node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u ec2-user -e
@reboot /home/ec2-user/projects/HelloWorld/restartServer.sh
c3b64133-4783-423f-92f8-d0eff748a1a5.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 

<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%a.nodeFileName%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%a.projectPath%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &

b9a946d8-1cde-4c12-b4dd-4198ec1088a5.script:
#set the insert point for children
echo 'var:currentHtmlInsert:insert<%c.id%>'

#Insert row tag rm
rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '<newID>' <%c.id%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

<%s.Replace file line with file%> <%p.currentHtmlInsert%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt <%a.servicePathFileName%> 

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

snap:<%a.testingHostPort%><%a.serviceRoute%>

6c96ab9c-edb4-4964-830d-f432e63174ab.name: table
6c96ab9c-edb4-4964-830d-f432e63174ab.script:
#Save html template 
rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert table ID
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%tableDiv%' <%c.tableDivId%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#add currentHtmlInsert point to end of template
echo -e '\n<!-- <%p.currentHtmlInsert%> -->' >> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt 

#insert updated template into currentHtmlInsert
<%s.Replace file line with file%> <%p.currentHtmlInsert%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt <%a.servicePathFileName%>

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

echo var:indexTableDivName:<%c.tableDivId%>



#Save js template 2  into doc.ready() function in header of a.servicePathFileName
rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
saveTemplate:2:<%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert createTableFunctionName
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%createTableFunctionName%' <%c.createTableFunctionName%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt 

#insert table tableDivName
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%tableDiv%' '<%c.tableDivId%>' <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert table fields to include
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%fields%' '<%c.fields%>' <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert table fieldto be the link
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%linkField%' '<%c.linkField%>' <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#add  doc.ready point to end of template
echo -e '\n<!-- <%a.insertDocReadyJS%> -->' >> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt 

#insert updated template into insertDocReadyJS
<%s.Replace file line with file%> <%a.insertDocReadyJS%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt <%a.servicePathFileName%>
rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

be54b3fe-222d-4cfb-ae17-dce058a8b4d1.description:
Form tag
Adds js to doc.ready() to prevent default form submit & page refresh
be54b3fe-222d-4cfb-ae17-dce058a8b4d1.script:

echo var:currentFormId:<%c.id%>

saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

400b8528-27c0-4f34-8f6b-8ec4c926828c.name: Install letsencrypt SSL Cert

ops.insert: Build and execute acme-client to retrieve cert, key & ca from letsencrypt. This will allow encrypted and ca verified https communication.

. 
Only challenge type 'http-01' is implemented.

c.email must be your valid email
c.commitment must be either staging (to test and not apply changes) or production (to apply changes)

This component will communicate with Let's Encrypt API and create  -> delete a 'challenge' file in the static folder.
Ensure this server has http port 80 open and publicly reachable via  <%a.hostName%>  and not redirecting when building. 
3 files are generated;
/home/%a.systemUser%/.ssl/%a.hostName%.key  
/home/%a.systemUser%/.ssl/%a.hostName%.cert
/home/%a.systemUser%/.ssl/%a.hostName%.csr

400b8528-27c0-4f34-8f6b-8ec4c926828c.script:
<%s.npmInstall%> acme-client

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/genSSL.sh
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/genSSL.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/genSSL.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%staticPath%' <%a.staticPath%> <%a.projectPath%>/genSSL.sh
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%hostName%' <%a.hostName%>   <%a.projectPath%>/genSSL.sh
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%systemUser%' <%a.systemUser%>  <%a.projectPath%>/genSSL.sh
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%email%' <%c.email%>  <%a.projectPath%>/genSSL.sh
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%commitment%' <%c.commitment%>  <%a.projectPath%>/genSSL.sh

mkdir <%a.staticPath%>/.well-known
mkdir <%a.staticPath%>/.well-known/acme-challenge

mkdir /home/<%a.systemUser%>/.ssl

node <%a.projectPath%>/genSSL.sh

    </style>

    <script type = "text/javascript" language = "javascript" >

        $(document).ready(function() {

            $("#navbar-fixed-top").hide();

            $('.scroller').scroll(function(e) {
                //$('.scroller').scrollTop(e.target.scrollTop);
                var scr = e.target.scrollTop;
                if (scr > 250){
                    $("#navbar-fixed-top").css('z-index', 1);
                    $("#navbar-fixed-top").slideDown("slow");
                }else{
                    $("#navbar-fixed-top").css('z-index', -1);
                    $("#navbar-fixed-top").slideUp("slow");
                }
            });

07e76bc6-18aa-4afc-86b2-62bf9c48827f.name: re/start node
07e76bc6-18aa-4afc-86b2-62bf9c48827f.description:
Calls sudo forever start to start the node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u ec2-user -e
@reboot /home/ec2-user/projects/HelloWorld/restartServer.sh
07e76bc6-18aa-4afc-86b2-62bf9c48827f.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 

<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%a.nodeFileName%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%a.projectPath%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &

7d076631-d155-483a-a784-49de31e00a2e.name: Get Started (/getstarted)
7d076631-d155-483a-a784-49de31e00a2e.script:
echo var:viewName:<%c.viewName%> 
echo var:serviceRoute:<%c.serviceRoute%> 

export tempFile=<%a.projectPath%>/<%c.tempFile%>

#save router code
rm -f $tempFile
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/<%c.tempFile%>
<%s.waitFor%> $tempFile


<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%viewName%' <%c.viewName%> $tempFile

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serviceRoute%' <%c.serviceRoute%> $tempFile

echo -e '\n<!-- <%a.insertServices%> -->' >> $tempFile 

#insert router code into Node script 
<%s.Replace file line with file%> '<%a.insertServices%>' $tempFile <%a.serverPathFile%>

rm -f $tempFile

4ecd7eeb-4574-46f4-899b-cd2a5b7e8311.name: Get Started UI
4ecd7eeb-4574-46f4-899b-cd2a5b7e8311.script:
#Save service ejs 
rm -f <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
saveTemplate:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

#use viewName for custom css & js file names
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%viewName%' <%p.viewName%>  <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:servicePathFileName:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
echo var:insertDocReadyJS:%insertDocReady%

echo var:insertJsSrc:%insertJsSrc%
echo var:insertCSSSrc:%insertCSSSrc%

echo var:customCSSFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
echo var:customJsFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js

echo var:insertBodyHTML:%insertBodyHTML%

#create blank custom css file
mkdir <%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS
export cssPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
rm -f $cssPath 
touch $cssPath 
echo '<!-- %customCSSInsert% -->' >> $cssPath 

echo var:customCSSInsert:%customCSSInsert%

cda0eb2a-167c-4f2a-bf6b-f3516f5b973b.name: re/start node
cda0eb2a-167c-4f2a-bf6b-f3516f5b973b.description:
Calls sudo forever start to start the node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u ec2-user -e
@reboot /home/ec2-user/projects/HelloWorld/restartServer.sh
cda0eb2a-167c-4f2a-bf6b-f3516f5b973b.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 

<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%a.nodeFileName%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%a.projectPath%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%jsonVar%' <%c.jsonVar%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert updated template into currentHtmlInsert
<%s.Replace file line with file%> '<%a.add_inits%>' <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt <%a.serverPathFile%>

echo 'var:dataStoreVar:<%c.jsonVar%>'
echo 'var:dataStoreFile:<%a.projectPath%>/<%c.saveFileName%>'

setPromptCodes:3e 20
    echo "{}" > <%a.projectPath%>/<%c.saveFileName%>
fi
setPrompt:[SysStack]

371f2667-15e6-451f-8428-5823f0177d02.script:

saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%jsonVar%' <%p.dataStoreVar%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#add currentHtmlInsert point to end of template

#insert updated template into server file
<%s.Replace file line with file%> '<%a.insertServices%>' <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt <%a.serverPathFile%> 

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

echo 'var:ezSaveFileFunction:<%c.serviceEndPointName%>SaveFile'

fb801c5d-b152-49ff-a6bb-a247a860af51.name: Contact UI
fb801c5d-b152-49ff-a6bb-a247a860af51.script:
#Save service ejs 
rm -f <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
saveTemplate:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

#use viewName for custom css & js file names
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%viewName%' <%p.viewName%>  <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:servicePathFileName:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
echo var:insertDocReadyJS:%insertDocReady%

echo var:insertJsSrc:%insertJsSrc%
echo var:insertCSSSrc:%insertCSSSrc%

echo var:customCSSFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
echo var:customJsFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js

echo var:insertBodyHTML:%insertBodyHTML%

#create blank custom css file
mkdir <%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS
export cssPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
rm -f $cssPath 
touch $cssPath 
echo '<!-- %customCSSInsert% -->' >> $cssPath 

echo var:customCSSInsert:%customCSSInsert%

3d1d0978-69b1-4fc7-943c-aad91871cbc1.name: re/start node
3d1d0978-69b1-4fc7-943c-aad91871cbc1.description:
Calls sudo forever start to start the node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u ec2-user -e
@reboot /home/ec2-user/projects/HelloWorld/restartServer.sh
3d1d0978-69b1-4fc7-943c-aad91871cbc1.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 

<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%a.nodeFileName%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%a.projectPath%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &

    echo "{}" > <%a.projectPath%>/<%c.saveFileName%>
fi
setPrompt:[SysStack]

74e6fc63-38f5-4f4d-9960-e01c6792eaad.name: FAQ Data Store Get - /faqGet
74e6fc63-38f5-4f4d-9960-e01c6792eaad.description:
Provides a simple service to get jason data from a data store.
Returns a row or all rows. 
Call service with 'id=#' to get all rows. Call with 'id=[id]' to get a specific row.
Eg: 
http://myNode/ezGet&id=#
   This will return all rows
http://myNode/ezGet&id=123
  This will return only row where id=123
74e6fc63-38f5-4f4d-9960-e01c6792eaad.script:
rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert jsonVar
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%jsonVar%' <%p.dataStoreVar%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert service End Point name
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serviceEndPointName%' <%c.serviceEndPointName%>  <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
echo var:ezDataGetServiceEndPointName:<%c.serviceEndPointName%>

#add currentHtmlInsert point to end of template
echo -e '\n<!-- <%a.insertServices%>  -->' >> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt 

#insert updated template into server file
<%s.Replace file line with file%> '<%a.insertServices%>' <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt <%a.serverPathFile%> 

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

e948241d-df06-42af-92ae-c8f5581210f3.name: FAQ UI
e948241d-df06-42af-92ae-c8f5581210f3.script:
#Save service ejs 
rm -f <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
saveTemplate:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

#use viewName for custom css & js file names
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%viewName%' <%p.viewName%>  <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:servicePathFileName:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
echo var:insertDocReadyJS:%insertDocReady%

echo var:insertJsSrc:%insertJsSrc%
echo var:insertCSSSrc:%insertCSSSrc%

echo var:customCSSFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
echo var:customJsFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js

echo var:insertBodyHTML:%insertBodyHTML%

#create blank custom css file
mkdir <%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS
export cssPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
rm -f $cssPath 
touch $cssPath 
echo '<!-- %customCSSInsert% -->' >> $cssPath 

echo var:customCSSInsert:%customCSSInsert%

a8e9b31b-c2c8-423c-9e68-0fd4750bb1a4.name: re/start node
a8e9b31b-c2c8-423c-9e68-0fd4750bb1a4.description:
Calls sudo forever start to start the node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u ec2-user -e
@reboot /home/ec2-user/projects/HelloWorld/restartServer.sh
a8e9b31b-c2c8-423c-9e68-0fd4750bb1a4.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 

<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%a.nodeFileName%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%a.projectPath%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &

c42c57cf-b096-4da3-86c2-b55912254e34.name: Survey UI
c42c57cf-b096-4da3-86c2-b55912254e34.script:
#Save service ejs 
rm -f <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
saveTemplate:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

#use viewName for custom css & js file names
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%viewName%' <%p.viewName%>  <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:servicePathFileName:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
echo var:insertDocReadyJS:%insertDocReady%

echo var:insertJsSrc:%insertJsSrc%
echo var:insertCSSSrc:%insertCSSSrc%

echo var:customCSSFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
echo var:customJsFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js

echo var:insertBodyHTML:%insertBodyHTML%
echo var:currentHTMLInsert:%insertBodyHTML%

#create blank custom css file
mkdir <%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS
export cssPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
rm -f $cssPath 
touch $cssPath 
echo '<!-- %customCSSInsert% -->' >> $cssPath 

echo var:customCSSInsert:%customCSSInsert%


#create blank custom JS file
mkdir <%s.staticPath%>/clientJs
export jsPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js
rm -f $jsPath 
touch $jsPath 
echo '<!-- %customJsInsert% -->' >> $jsPath 

echo var:customJsInsert:%customJsInsert%

136dc29c-72dc-451d-960f-3b49cd2d6fe2.name: re/start node
136dc29c-72dc-451d-960f-3b49cd2d6fe2.description:
Calls sudo forever start to start the node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u ec2-user -e
@reboot /home/ec2-user/projects/HelloWorld/restartServer.sh
136dc29c-72dc-451d-960f-3b49cd2d6fe2.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 

<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%a.nodeFileName%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%a.projectPath%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &

109bfff2-2461-4e4e-b488-dbd227fb9c27.name: re/start node
109bfff2-2461-4e4e-b488-dbd227fb9c27.description:
Calls sudo forever start to start the node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u ec2-user -e
@reboot /home/ec2-user/projects/HelloWorld/restartServer.sh
109bfff2-2461-4e4e-b488-dbd227fb9c27.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 

<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%a.nodeFileName%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%a.projectPath%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &

c3e8cfab-ed5e-4f57-ad90-3a3d9fc600f1.name: sessions
c3e8cfab-ed5e-4f57-ad90-3a3d9fc600f1.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 
pwd
<%s.npmInstall%> express-session
<%s.npmInstall%> session-file-store
<%s.npmInstall%> password-hash

#Generate pw hash and create identity json
rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/identity/identity.json
rm -f ./setIdentity.js
mkdir <%a.projectPath%>/identity
saveTemplate:3:<%a.projectPath%>/setIdentity.js
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/setIdentity.js
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%password%' '<%c.password%>' <%a.projectPath%>/setIdentity.js
node ./setIdentity.js
rm -r ./setIdentity.js

export serverPathFile="<%p.serverPathFile%>"
export toReplace="//<add_Requires>"
export newline="var session = require('express-session');\nvar FileStore = require('session-file-store')(session);\n//<add_Requires>"

<%s.Replace file str with str%> "$toReplace" "$newline" "$serverPathFile"

saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/temp.txt
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/temp.txt
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%secret%' '<%c.secret%>' <%a.projectPath%>/temp.txt

ls
export toReplace='<add_app.use>'
<%s.Replace file line with file%> $toReplace temp.txt "$serverPathFile"
rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/temp.txt

<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/temp2.txt

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/temp2.txt

9ab30f6a-c6bc-4255-9f92-61deea1f9fee.name: CM Data Store Get (/cmGet)
9ab30f6a-c6bc-4255-9f92-61deea1f9fee.description:
Provides a simple service to get jason data from a data store.
Returns a row or all rows. 
Call service with 'id=#' to get all rows. Call with 'id=[id]' to get a specific row.
Eg: 
http://myNode/ezGet&id=#
   This will return all rows
http://myNode/ezGet&id=123
  This will return only row where id=123
9ab30f6a-c6bc-4255-9f92-61deea1f9fee.script:

#insert jsonVar
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%jsonVar%' <%p.dataStoreVar%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

echo var:ezDataGetServiceEndPointName:<%c.serviceEndPointName%>

#add currentHtmlInsert point to end of template
echo -e '\n<!-- <%a.insertServices%>  -->' >> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt 

#insert updated template into server file
<%s.Replace file line with file%> '<%a.insertServices%>' <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt <%a.serverPathFile%> 

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

5ad2c006-aa2c-4bb3-a49e-e92f13d6c297.name: FM Data Store Get (/fmGet)
5ad2c006-aa2c-4bb3-a49e-e92f13d6c297.description:
Provides a simple service to get jason data from a data store.
Returns a row or all rows. 
Call service with 'id=#' to get all rows. Call with 'id=[id]' to get a specific row.
Eg: 
http://myNode/ezGet&id=#
   This will return all rows
http://myNode/ezGet&id=123
  This will return only row where id=123

#add currentHtmlInsert point to end of template

#insert updated template into server file

c7ea09fc-4327-4cda-b0b5-5025347609bd.name: FAQ Manager UI
c7ea09fc-4327-4cda-b0b5-5025347609bd.script:
#Save service ejs 
rm -f <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
saveTemplate:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

#use viewName for custom css & js file names
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%viewName%' <%p.viewName%>  <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:customCSSFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
echo var:customJsFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%clientCSS%' '/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css'  <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%clientJs%' '/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js'  <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

#create blank custom css file
export cssPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
rm -f $cssPath 
touch $cssPath 
echo '<!-- %customCSSInsert% -->' >> $cssPath 

echo var:customCSSInsert:%customCSSInsert%

echo var:servicePathFileName:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:insertDocReadyJS:%insertDocReady%

762882a4-e9a5-4474-8e93-e077bedb3b38.name: Grid UI
762882a4-e9a5-4474-8e93-e077bedb3b38.script:
#Save service ejs 
rm -f <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
saveTemplate:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

#use viewName for custom css & js file names
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%viewName%' <%p.viewName%>  <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:servicePathFileName:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
echo var:insertDocReadyJS:%insertDocReady%

echo var:insertJsSrc:%insertJsSrc%
echo var:insertCSSSrc:%insertCSSSrc%

echo var:customCSSFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
echo var:customJsFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js

echo var:insertBodyHTML:%insertBodyHTML%
echo var:currentHTMLInsert:%insertBodyHTML%

#create blank custom css file
mkdir <%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS
export cssPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
rm -f $cssPath 
touch $cssPath 
echo '<!-- %customCSSInsert% -->' >> $cssPath 

echo var:customCSSInsert:%customCSSInsert%


#create blank custom JS file
mkdir <%s.staticPath%>/clientJs
export jsPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js
rm -f $jsPath 
touch $jsPath 
echo '<!-- %customJsInsert% -->' >> $jsPath 

echo var:customJsInsert:%customJsInsert%

be022f92-8bc3-4436-85f5-9d62f6974685.name: Remote Apps

ops.insert:
Project to expose AWS automation features 

c.projectName=projectName , no spaces
c.hostName=host name for use in https if enabled
c.testingProt= either https:// or http:// 
c.testingPort= The port the test prot can be found at. Eg. 8447
c.user= Name of the system user. Eg. ec2-user

be022f92-8bc3-4436-85f5-9d62f6974685.script:
cd ~
pwd
export projectName=<%c.projectName%> 

sudo rm -fr projects/$projectName/
mkdir ./projects/
mkdir projects/$projectName/
cd ./projects/$projectName/

export:projectPath:pwd

echo var:projectName:$projectName

echo var:testingHostPort:<%c.testingProt%><%s.host%>:<%c.testingPort%> 

echo var:systemUser:<%c.user%> 

echo var:hostName:<%c.hostName%>

50e421db-9505-414a-9e94-b81b9730ffa8.name: Node instance (RemoteStart.js)

ops.insert:
Create Node JS application that will launch a specified AWS instance and then redirect to specified service once it is available.
Setup Node instance + support 
-express
-fs
-bodyParser

50e421db-9505-414a-9e94-b81b9730ffa8.script:
rm -f <%p.projectPath%>/<%c.nodeFileName%>
saveTemplate:<%p.projectPath%>/<%c.nodeFileName%>
<%s.waitFor%> <%p.projectPath%>/<%c.nodeFileName%>

export serverPath=<%p.projectPath%>
export serverPathFile=<%p.projectPath%>/<%c.nodeFileName%>

echo var:serverPathFile:$serverPathFile
echo var:nodeFileName:<%c.nodeFileName%>

chmod 660 $serverPathFile

cd $serverPath
#npm install express --save
<%s.npmInstall%> express 
<%s.npmInstall%> formidable 

rm -f <%p.projectPath%>/404.html
saveTemplate:2:<%p.projectPath%>/404.html

echo 'var:add_inits:<add_inits>'
echo 'var:add_functions:<add_functions>'

mkdir <%p.projectPath%>/static
echo var:staticPath:<%p.projectPath%>/static

d63ac2dd-423f-44e3-a660-9c578f16028e.name: sudo re/start Node
d63ac2dd-423f-44e3-a660-9c578f16028e.description:
Installs and calls sudo forever start to start node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u SysStackUser -e
@reboot /home/SysStackUser/projects/proto/restartServer.sh
d63ac2dd-423f-44e3-a660-9c578f16028e.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 

<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

echo ============restart================== >> <%a.projectPath%>/err.log
rm -f <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%a.nodeFileName%>  <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%s.projectPath%> <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
rm -f nohup.out
nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &

8ab40b7b-90d5-4cb7-90f7-e8f51f91036b.name: sudo stop Node
8ab40b7b-90d5-4cb7-90f7-e8f51f91036b.description: Calls sudo forever stop to stop node process

feed94e1-7343-4ca7-aa65-99e73ef36f38.description: Test connection to system and ability to snap

0810b60a-8e18-4f02-8804-9afa2bda6e7f.name: http (8447)

ops.insert: loads node script with http functions

0810b60a-8e18-4f02-8804-9afa2bda6e7f.script:
export serverPathFile="<%p.serverPathFile%>"
export toReplace="//<add_Requires>"
export newline="var http = require('http');\n//<add_Requires>"

<%s.Replace file str with str%> "$toReplace" "$newline" "$serverPathFile"

saveTemplate:tmp.txt
<%s.waitFor%> tmp.txt
export toReplace='<add_listen>'

<%s.Replace file line with file%> $toReplace tmp.txt "$serverPathFile"
rm -f tmp.txt

export toReplace="portxxxx"
export newline="<%c.port%>"
<%s.Replace file str with str%> "$toReplace" "$newline" "$serverPathFile"

d899f699-53b2-46f1-8a88-1b42163dc5d1.name: services
d899f699-53b2-46f1-8a88-1b42163dc5d1.description: Insert point for services that do not require authentication

a8b0fa61-f94f-49b6-847a-5f04867c2b16.name: Remote Server Start (/start)
a8b0fa61-f94f-49b6-847a-5f04867c2b16.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%>
<%s.npmInstall%> aws-sdk 
<%s.npmInstall%> request 

echo var:serviceRoute:<%c.serviceRoute%> 

export tempFile=<%a.projectPath%>/<%c.tempFile%>

#save router code
rm -f $tempFile
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/<%c.tempFile%>
<%s.waitFor%> $tempFile

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serviceRoute%' <%c.serviceRoute%> $tempFile
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serviceRouteAlt%' <%c.serviceRouteAlt%> $tempFile

echo -e '\n<!-- <%a.insertServices%> -->' >> $tempFile 

#insert router code into Node script 
<%s.Replace file line with file%> '<%a.insertServices%>' $tempFile <%a.serverPathFile%>

rm -f $tempFile

bba668af-ed99-4e06-a284-fbbb7fe8076a.name: Remote Server Start Service (/rss)
bba668af-ed99-4e06-a284-fbbb7fe8076a.description: Main service for Remote Server Start UI
bba668af-ed99-4e06-a284-fbbb7fe8076a.script:
echo var:viewName:<%c.viewName%> 
echo var:serviceRoute:<%c.serviceRoute%> 

export tempFile=<%a.projectPath%>/<%c.tempFile%>

#save router code
rm -f $tempFile
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/<%c.tempFile%>
<%s.waitFor%> $tempFile


<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%viewName%' <%c.viewName%> $tempFile

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serviceRoute%' <%c.serviceRoute%> $tempFile
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serviceRouteAlt%' <%c.serviceRouteAlt%> $tempFile

echo -e '\n<!-- <%a.insertServices%> -->' >> $tempFile 

#insert router code into Node script 
<%s.Replace file line with file%> '<%a.insertServices%>' $tempFile <%a.serverPathFile%>

rm -f $tempFile

9097eb4f-f90d-4bd5-ab90-24f7ac191805.name: Rss UI
9097eb4f-f90d-4bd5-ab90-24f7ac191805.script:
#Save service ejs 
rm -f <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
saveTemplate:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

#use viewName for custom css & js file names
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%viewName%' <%p.viewName%>  <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:servicePathFileName:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
echo var:insertDocReadyJS:%insertDocReady%

echo var:insertJsSrc:%insertJsSrc%
echo var:insertCSSSrc:%insertCSSSrc%

echo var:customCSSFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
echo var:customJsFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js

echo var:insertBodyHTML:%insertBodyHTML%

#create blank custom css file
mkdir <%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS
export cssPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
rm -f $cssPath 
touch $cssPath 
echo '<!-- %customCSSInsert% -->' >> $cssPath 

echo var:customCSSInsert:%customCSSInsert%

#create blank custom JS file
mkdir <%s.staticPath%>/clientJs
export jsPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js
rm -f $jsPath 
touch $jsPath 
echo '<!-- %customJsInsert% -->' >> $jsPath 

echo var:customJsInsert:%customJsInsert%

f48c3a32-ee24-4f23-b6f1-d9bb71957fd8.name: re/start node
f48c3a32-ee24-4f23-b6f1-d9bb71957fd8.description:
Calls sudo forever start to start the node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u ec2-user -e
@reboot /home/ec2-user/projects/HelloWorld/restartServer.sh
f48c3a32-ee24-4f23-b6f1-d9bb71957fd8.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 

<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%a.nodeFileName%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%a.projectPath%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &

9b30ae75-25a3-4947-8685-9331ea9c5e87.name: sudo re/start Node
9b30ae75-25a3-4947-8685-9331ea9c5e87.description:
Installs and calls sudo forever start to start node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u SysStackUser -e
@reboot /home/SysStackUser/projects/proto/restartServer.sh
9b30ae75-25a3-4947-8685-9331ea9c5e87.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 

<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

echo ============restart================== >> <%a.projectPath%>/err.log
rm -f <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%a.nodeFileName%>  <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%s.projectPath%> <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
rm -f nohup.out
nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &

2e2aac80-7be2-4d41-ac53-ba64f29bc6c6.name: https (8447)

ops.insert:
https://matoski.com/article/node-express-generate-ssl/
 sudo yum install –y https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/epel-release-latest-7.noarch.rpm
sudo yum install -y pwgen
pwgen 50 1 -s > passphrase

openssl req -new -newkey rsa:4096 -days 365 -nodes -x509 -subj "/C=US/ST=Denial/L=Springfield/O=Dis/CN=www.example.com" -keyout server.key -out server.crt

2e2aac80-7be2-4d41-ac53-ba64f29bc6c6.script:
export serverPathFile="<%p.serverPathFile%>"
export toReplace="//<add_Requires>"
export newline="var https = require('https');\n//<add_Requires>"

<%s.Replace file str with str%> "$toReplace" "$newline" "$serverPathFile" 

mkdir <%a.projectPath%>/ssl
cd <%a.projectPath%>/ssl
pwd

#create self signed
# openssl req -new -newkey rsa:4096 -days 365 -nodes -x509 -subj "<%c.subject%>" -keyout server.key -out server.crt

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert new https port
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%port%' <%c.port%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert new host name
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%hostName%' <%a.hostName%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert new user name
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%systemUser%' <%a.systemUser%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#add currentHtmlInsert point to end of template
echo -e '\n//<add_listen>' >> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt 

#insert updated template into server file
<%s.Replace file line with file%> '<add_listen>' <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt <%a.serverPathFile%> 
rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
